messages.msgSnippet: Beam of sincerity [ of the truth of the opening of a country which the winner erased - a new compilation group ], and Aizu Bushido ISBN 4761261897
messages.messageBody:
"Beam of sincerity [ of the truth of the opening of a country which
the winner erased - a new compilation group ], and Aizu Bushido"
ISBN 4761261897
http://www.amazon.co.jp/exec/obidos/ASIN/4761261897/qid%3D1102028155/250-3209924-7965839

I niftied the summary and review...the book goes into detail about the
treaties and the various Western powers.
